2021-05-14

Rover

CONNOR HAINJE

For the final project of my computer graphics course (COS 426), I used Three.js to build a game where you can play as a rover exploring Mars. It’s not a very sophisticated game, but I’m quite proud of what I was able to accomplish in ~10 days with pretty much no prior experience building a game from the ground up.

You can find the game here.
